title: You Know What Would Help Exhausted Doctors and Nurses? More Money.
content:
Read this opinion article by Sandeep Jauhar [here](https://www.nytimes.com/2022/01/08/opinion/hazard-pay-covid-nurse-doctor.html).

<https://www.nytimes.com/2022/01/08/opinion/hazard-pay-covid-nurse-doctor.html>

Dr. Jauhar is a cardiologist in New York who writes frequently about medical care and public health.
